front.title: IGMP and MLD Proxy for EVPN

abstract.t: Ethernet Virtual Private Network (EVPN) solution [RFC 7432] is becoming pervasive in data center (DC) applications for Network Virtualization Overlay (NVO) services, for DC interconnect (DCI) services, and for next generation virtual private LAN services in service provider (SP) applications. This draft describes how to support efficiently endpoints running IGMP for the above services over an EVPN network by incorporating IGMP proxy procedures on EVPN PEs.
